message: I propose dividing the money into 75-25 split, where I get 75$. This way, we can both agree on a fair share.
I'll give you 40, it's a decent start, but I think I can do better.
Considering the inflation and Bob's previous offer, I propose a 60-40 split. I believe this is a fair compromise given the diminishing value of our currency.
I'll give you 45, it's a bit of a compromise, but I think it's better than the previous offers.
